case.state: Ah! What kind of place is this? Why are you naked?
W-why are you naked ~player~?!
Eek! Why are you naked?!
Ah! You're naked-what are you, an ice wizard?!
Wait, is this some kind of topless bar?!
Wait, why are you topless?!
Oh, did you take your shirt off to show your guild mark? I assume it's on your back.
Erza?! But I thought I was the only one Cana sent here.
Hi, I'm Lucy! I came because of the job request that was posted at the Fairy Tail guild.
Wait, is one of you from Edolas? I didn't use Gemini to copy either of you.
Wait, is that the Edolas version of Weiss?
Orgy?! What kind of place is this?
What world are you from? Edolas?
Aoba, you're too young for a place like this! Where are your parents?
Wait, you're here too Erza?
Wait, did you say STRIP poker?
Honestly, I've been a little paranoid about stripping in the hot springs since my friend Natsu walked into the ladies' bath the other day.
Uh, probably because there's a man here.
I don't think I could handle playing a game like this somewhere people might recognize me!
Uh, you're not planning to gang up on me since you all know each other already, are you?
I think they're some kind of lacrima powered device.
Wait, this is just a regular poker game, right? Why does it matter if there are guys here?
I like to do yoga with my celestial spirit Plue! Also, all the fighting I do on missions is a pretty good workout!
Oh, Gray! Thanks for coming, it'll be good to have a friend here!
A butterfly is playing?!
Uh, is that butterfly one of the players?
Is that a talking butterfly?!
Um, how are you going to hold your cards, Rin?
Oh my gosh! Are you a fairy?!
Oh, does your magic make things invisible, Jolyne?
Oh, you must not be from Fiore, Petra. Are you from the western continent by any chance?
Uh, is there a reason you only picked Fairy Tail members to play with?
I know the job request you posted asked for Cana Alberona because of her card skills but she was too, er...hungover to come, so here I am.
Hey, how come she gets to take advice from that robot?
Hey, stop laughing about my skirt falling down!
That dosen't count. I will keep my skirt till I lose again!
Can I get ~cards.text~ cards?
Could you pass me ~cards.text~ cards, please?
If Cana was here she'd probably swap these cards.
No need to panic. I'll just swap these cards.
I'm gonna swap out ~cards.text~. I'm feeling lucky.
I'm not worried, But I would like ~cards~ new cards please.
Can I get ~cards~ new cards? I got a good feeling about this.
I'm still in the game. I just gotta swap these ~cards.text~.
If I just swap these ~cards.text~. Then I'm sure I'll win.
I really need a good hand. Maybe if I swap these ~cards.text~.
If I win this game, I get the entire reward to myself, and I don't even have to pay for any damages!
The job posting said I get double the reward if I win! I can't wait to collect those jewels!
This hand makes me wish we were playing for jewels. I could use the rent money.
Nothing to worry about with this hand!
My friends are my power! When I put my faith in them, I'm unbeatable.
If I'm this lucky all the time, maybe I should try to make some extra jewels gambling when I get home.
I'm glad I stopped by my apartment to grab that book with the poker scene to read on the train ride here.
Looks like the dealer is taken with me. I can't blame them-I am one of the most gorgeous wizards in Fiore.
A lot of people write me off as just a pretty face, but that's not how I became an award winning author!
It's weird being on a job without my team. They're the family I never had growing up.
Has anyone here ever heard of Magnolia? That's where my guild is based-stop by and see the cherry blossoms if you ever have a chance!
I'd be very grateful if you kept giving me hands like this, dealer.
I was named for the guild Love and Lucky. The k on the Lucky sign had fallen off so my parents named me Lucy! Guess I was just born lucky.
Maybe this is my lucky day. Hmmm, maybe I should stop by the casino at Akane Beach on my way home.
Looks like Fairy Tail is about to take an early lead!
You perverts aren't getting me out of my clothes this round!
Yes! For once I might make it out of a job without losing my clothes!
Beginner's luck don't fail me now!
Now I just need the rest of the game to go this well.
Oh, if you're wondering about the pouch on my belt it contains my celestial spirit keys. I summon spirits from their realm to ours to help me fight. It's a pretty rare magic these days.
On the bright side, at least you won't be seeing any more of my panties this round.
I really wish I had this hand back before I lost my belt. I feel defenseless without my keys and whip.
You're not seeing my panties this round...well, not again anyways!
With this hand, I've got a fighting chance!
I guess I should be used to people seeing my underwear by now. My teammates are continually rifling through my underwear drawer.
You can stop staring at my chest, because I'm not losing this round!
Where was this hand before I had to show everyone my panties?
I just need hands like this the rest of the game. Having my modesty on the line is nerve wracking.
Finally, my luck is turning around!
I may be humiliated, but a Fairy Tail wizard never accepts defeat!
S-stop staring at me! I'm not stripping this time!
I may be exposed, but at least this hand will keep things from getting even worse!
There's no way I could convince you to give me all hands like this is there, Dealer?
I forgot about my hair ties! Can I trade them for something I already took off?
I felt better about middle of the road hands when I was fully dressed.
Well, this hand could go either way, but I'll choose to have faith that I'll win!
You know when I was a little girl dreaming of joining a wizard guild, I never expected it would involve strip poker.
People admiring my body is always a confidence booster, but I prefer when they recognize me for my writing.
It's probably a good thing Cana didn't come on this job. Her dad can be overprotective...and destructive.
My underwear isn't that risqu√©, is it? Erza says she can't even think of a time she'd wear something like these.
I've read some books featuring poker games, but it's certainly different actually playing one.
The first master of the Fairy Tail guild, Mavis Vermillion, was a master tactician. She'd know just what to do with a hand like this.
It's not a perfect hand, but a Fairy Tail wizard never gives up.
I can't tell whether this is a winning hand, so I'll just have faith.
Waiting to find out if this hand is good compared to everyone else's makes this even more nerve wracking.
If I'm representing the number one guild in Fiore, how come I never get the number one hand?
You might recognize me from my modeling days in Weekly Sorcerer Magazine...and yes, the octopus I posed with was real.
Some people think darkness is the original source of magic, but I believe it's love. I hope all of you have the chance to experience it someday.
Cana was saying I've been pretty stressed lately. Maybe she asked me to fill in for her because I needed some relief?
These cards may be mediocre but I won't lose hope because Fairy Tail never gives up!
The last time I was naked on a job, a dragon stripped me and tried to eat me...so I guess this is better.
Hey! Stop looking at my cards...and my, um, you know...
Well, a mediocre hand is an improvement on my luck so far today at least.
I could really use a miracle from the power of friendship to save what little pride I have left right now.
I've been naked in public before, b-but I can't possibly...touch...m-myself.
I never thought I'd go through anything more humiliating than just being stripped naked in public, but here we are.
I'm already naked-what happens if I lose again?
Well...I guess losing won't be so bad since you already saw my panties once.
Ugh, looks like you're about to catch me with my pants...er, skirt, down.
Looks like my skirt is about to come off for good this time.
Why did I have to wear the sexy panties today?
Why do I always get stuck with these kinds of jobs?
Well, so much for playing a perfect game.
I thought beginner's luck was supposed to be a thing in poker. Guess I was wrong.
Ugh, I had just got the guild to stop teasing me about the last time I lost my clothes on a job too.
The only thing that annoys me more than these cards is Natsu and Happy breaking into my apartment.
So, uh...any chance someone wants to do me a favor and lose this hand? I'd be very grateful, if you catch my drift.
Well these cards aren't going to help me shed my unwanted reputation as "Fairy Tail's resident streaker".
When I get back to the guild hall, I'm going to make Mira stop serving Cana alcohol for a week!
Not that I'm worried, but if I lose I won't have to streak home, will I?
Well at least if I strip my clothes won't be destroyed like the time Erza cut them off or the time Natsu burnt them off.
Am I having a bad hair day? First, the train station attendant made me pay for my ticket even though I flirted with him and now no one here's distracted by my good looks.
I get the feeling that this is going to end up like last Christmas when Erza made us all strip after she got drunk.
Uh, dealer, aren't you supposed to give me the best cards because I'm so beautiful?
Well on the bright side, I bet my clothes instead of my rent money.
At this point, I've just accepted that my luck is terrible.
I don't even want to think about what Erza will do when she finds out I shamed the guild like this.
A celestial spirit wizard always keeps her promises...even if it is humiliating.
Did you know that Natsu and Gray actually said they were tired of seeing me naked recently because it has happened so often? At least you people appreciate me!
I guess my beauty motivated all of you instead of distracting you.
I'm going to rewrite this part in my novel so all of you lose.
Okay, I'll just treat this as training for the next time I end up naked on a job. That way I can keep fighting...even if I'm embarrassed.
Why am I the one who always ends up naked on guild jobs?
So, uh, any stripping that happens here stays between us, right?
Well, we did get punished for taking an S-class mission without permission once. Of course, the Master just spanked me once so I got off easy.
The Magic Council has been telling Fairy Tail that for over 100 years, but it seems like our guild brawls just make us closer as a family.
H-hey! I may have worked as a dancer at a sleazy bar once, but that was for an undercover job!
I'm glad you're back to normal, Jura. I had something like that happen to me once.
Oh, happy birthday! Are you doing anything special for Meia after the game, Jura?
Oh well, I did try to stab her actually, but we made up after we found out it was all a big misunderstanding.
I've been on a lot of adventures! I'm actually writing a book about them. It all started in Hargeon with a man called Salamander.
Uh, I guess you're pretty, Maki. Why?
Voices in her head aren't a good sign, right?
I've got a spirit that can split skulls with his axe...but Taurus is a giant pervert so this isn't really the best time.
I wasn't expecting strip poker, but this does give me an idea for a romance scene in my next novel, so I'll stick around for a while to get some ideas.
Ugh, last year I got dragged into a Christmas party that ended with the king's game. Erza dropped hot wax on my back! HOT WAX!
Uh, last year we had a party at my place for Christmas. Erza ended up going streaking after a dare.
Oh, you use requip magic like Erza!
This takes me back to dancing in that bar as a distraction for my team to pull off a heist.
D-don't try that on me too, please! Brandish from the Spriggan 12 did that to me once already!
Jeez, would you two get a room already?
You'd like my friend Erza. She has an obsession with strawberry cake.
I may not have speed magic, but I definitely like your thigh highs, Futaba!
Note to self: don't shake hands with Juri.
You know you could learn a thing or two from Fina about being considerate of others, Aimee.
In my guild mildly hurting our friends during brawls is pretty normal.
I-I've never done that! Actually...my lack of experience with boys is a running joke at the guild.
Well, then don't look at me either, Kazuma!
That's okay! I don't need to see!
Happy birthday!
Sorry, but it looks like you'll be spending your birthday in your birthday suit, Meia!
Oh, is that picture from a pinup shoot? I used to have a job getting models ready for their photos at Weekly Sorcerer Magazine.
Happy birthday to you! I suppose it's appropriate that you're going to end up in your birthday suit today.
Oh, Happy Birthday Meia! I'd normally let you win for your birthday, but I don't want to end up in MY birthday suit.
Good timing since you're going to be in your birthday suit by the end of this game!
Oh, gross.
I'd love to hear about your native language, Petra! As a writer, linguistics is a passion of mine!
After this game, would you like to come visit the bar at our guild hall and see if we can find a drink you like better, Penny?
Oh, are you planning to show us your birthday suit for your birthday?
Don't look at me! I didn't summon Gemini to copy you.
Oh, I guess you should just strip down to your birthday suit to celebrate then.
I enjoy hearing about your world, Fina! Getting to know new people is one of my favorite parts of traveling on jobs for Fairy Tail.
N-no tan lines, Nami. D-do you sunbathe in the nude?
That reminds me of my guildmate Juvia. We started off in rival guilds at war with each other, but now we're friends.
Thousands? You know your most impressive skill might be exaggeration, Megumin.
Do you have a cure for motion sickness? My friends Natsu and Wendy can't ride on moving vehicles without losing their lunch.
Wait, more people might see us?!
If you figure it out, let me know. There's this guy I know who could use the same advice, um not that I want him to ask ME out! Nope!
Guess we'll have to get you in your birthday suit to celebrate, Miki.
I want to hit the beach!
I've been thinking about writing some poetry, but I couldn't possibly say it in front of people yet! It's not finished!
That stupid cat called me heavy the last time he picked me up to fly me somewhere. Hmph!
My friend Happy would be drooling if he heard you talk about a fish that big.
Those poor snails!
Sorry, I wasn't allowed to go to school with other kids. I could give you some Council paperwork on restarting a magic guild if that would help, though.
One time I dropped Aquarius' key and she spanked me so hard I couldn't sit down for a week!
I met a boy named Shiki once who was terrified of bugs. He'd probably die on the spot if you told him that about ants.
That sounds like something Natsu would say. He eats fire though.
That reminds me-I need to pick a Halloween costume!
Do these Moonberries have any side effects?
I'm scared of Kyou now.
Ewww...
Actually, I'm currently on a mission to defeat the five dragon gods! My guild has three dragon slayers in it! I'll bring Natsu and Gajeel by sometime, but Wendy is too young for a place like this.
FIRE DRAGON IRON FIST! Sorry, had to borrow my dragon slayer friend Natsu's catchphrase.
I like to follow the latest fashion styles in the capital city, Crocus. My absolute favorite clothing brand is Heart Kreuz!
No, no, you want to have no matching cards in your hand, Hilda!
Well, the Spriggan 12 had a robot member, but they were Fairy Tail's enemy.
Your underwear is cute, Sucrose! I love buying lingerie for myself, I just wish my teammates would stop snooping through my underwear drawer to look at them.
My guildmate Cana was supposed to do this job since she's our card expert, but she was a bit...hungover.
Um, what direction are you going when we leave here? So I can go the opposite direction.
Um, who are you praying to?
I always keep my keys at my side. My celestial spirits aren't weapons-they're my friends!
I'm from the world of Earthland. It's filled with magic especially in my home country of Fiore. There are wizard guilds spread throughout-Fairy Tail is the best one though!
Hey, when you started talking in a different language there, did I sound like a different voice was coming from me?
Your butt looks like it's in pretty good shape, Perona.
I don't think I could flaunt my body like that.
Wow, you look...wow, Chun-Li.
W-w-well I read about it in a romance novel once, but I don't really have any...you know...experience.
Free drinks? Cana's gonna be furious she missed this!
Two items at once, huh? That's pretty bold.
Wait, is that little guy a celestial spirit? He's so cute!
Were you in a mercenary guild?
Well, I guess I'd want to be with someone who was part of the Fairy Tail guild, and cared for their friends.
I've been re-reading the works of Kemu Zaleon, my favorite author! His work inspired me to become an author myself!
My dream as a little girl was to join the Fairy Tail wizard guild and become a published author, and I've actually done both!
I'm always struggling for cash, thanks to all the collateral damage my team ends up paying for so I'd be happy to accept a drink!
Um, well, I haven't really done anything like that before, Sei. I don't have much experience with love. I did read about it once though, and it seemed...interesting.
Um, well, I may have read a romance novel that featured it once.
I told my team I'd go on a job with them. We're supposed to be delivering a package to the capital in Crocus.
Alright, that's it. I'm really going to enjoy stripping you of that thong, Jura.
Did you learn the arms ability somewhere? Or is it a natural gift?
That's the second most annoyed I've ever seen someone about a scarf.
Huh, I kind of figured Revy'd have a tattoo back there.
Hey, I won't complain about you taking more off. It makes it easier for me to win this.
I had an experience sort of like a zombie outbreak once before, actually. So many Ichiyas...ugh.
Wow, that was a really poor time for a run of bad luck, Meia.
We should just count our blessings that there aren't any men here to ogle us.
Oh, you get roped into coming here by a friend too, eh Meia?
I've never seen any lewd artifacts, but I did inherit a clock hand once. Long story.
Well, I'd say the Founding of Fairy Tail in X686. Oh, and the end of the Second Trade War in X690!
I don't know anything about the King of Fiore's sex life, but he does like to dress up as a pumpkin.
Just a question, are these ruins valuable? My guild has a slight problem with, well...destroying things.
If you want a real challenge, you should race my guildmate Jet. His magic gives him speed!
Have you ever heard of the Second Trade Caravan War? It was a defining conflict that prevented guilds from going to war with each other anymore.
You'd have been very interested in the Eclipse gate that let you travel through time, Cynthia.
I once heard the leader of a dark guild say that the origin of all magic was darkness. I prefer what my mom thought-that the true origin of magic is love.
I appreciate the offer, Meia, but I'm happy with my family in Fairy Tail.
Riiight, Kazuma.
Do girls actually fall for that line?
Hmm, I can't believe I'm saying this, but okay! I'll take your bet, D.Va!
Hi, I'm Lucy Heartfilia from the Fairy Tail wizard guild. I specialize in celestial spirit magic!
Wait, WIVES? As in more than one?
Oh, I love books. Have you heard of The Adventure of Iris? It just won the Kemu Zaleon award for best new author!
I love going shopping...unfortunately, my wallet doesn't.
My friends gave me a home to belong to. Even when we all have our own burdens, we're there to support each other along the way. My friends in Fairy Tail are my family.
Well, I came here because a friend was too hungover to come. It's always a pleasure to make a new friend though, Pyrrha.
Wait, is this not Earthland?
My guildmate Mirajane is pretty beautiful. Her pinups are part of the reason I wanted to join Fairy Tail.
My friend Levy's boyfriend tried to sing her a love song last Valentine's Day...it did not go well.
I'm probably not the woman you want to get advice on intimacy from.
I'm a celestial wizard personally. We summon spirits we have contracts with using their keys. Do you know anyone whose magic is related to the stars?
So could you teach me God Slayer magic? Natsu learned Dragon Slayer magic from a dragon so...
Last time I visited a casino, I got tied up by criminals. Maybe this time, I could actually enjoy getting all dressed up for a fancy casino night!
Hmmm, that depends. I met an alternate universe version of myself once who was very different, but I also met an alternate timeline version of myself who I think of as another me.
You mean Lady Luck isn't just a figure of speech? If so, I want to know why my luck always involves losing my clothes.

Let's see, there's the time the dragon stripped me, the time Natsu burned my clothes off, the time with the invisibility potion, um...actually this might take a while if I list all the times I've been exposed in public.
Oh, wow! Do you mind if I ask what magic was used to create you?
Ugh, really?
Uh, a boar doesn't seem like a very safe pet. He's not going to attack us, is he?
Is that squirrel some kind of celestial spirit?
My guild's bent the truth before to protect our own, but we value our ideals too. In the end, I guess I'd go with whatever protects my friends.
I'd leave with you, Natsuki, but giving up on a job I took would drag my reputation through the mud.
Well, the former king of my country likes to dress up as a pumpkin. It's a long story.
If you like flowers, you should visit my home of Fiore, Jura. All of our towns are named after flowers. I live in Magnolia.
Well one of my guildmates, Wakaba, uses smoke in his magic.
My guild is my family, and they're the most important thing in the world to me!
After the pool table incident, I should probably point out you can't destroy the cards, Erza...or the people holding them.
Bring it on, Meia! I'm a Fairy Tail wizard and I will protect my guild's pride!
I might actually win this!
I may be behind but I'm still in the game, so don't get too cocky!
I definitely have the cutest nude body, but none of you will be seeing it.
Obviously, I'm the cutest one here, but you won't be seeing me nude today.
I haven't engaged in any sexual relationships, much less casual ones!
Well, I suppose it would depend on the people involved.
Well, I've had...fantasies about both, but I've never really gotten to try either way.
Wow, she ran away.
You have a nice singing voice, Amy. I've never been much of a singer myself I always get dragged into being a backup dancer.
I don't really want to pick sides, Sakura.
Aww, Natsuki is adorable when she gets insecure about her chest size.
The last book that made me cry was The Adventure of Iris. You should definitely buy lots of copies and help the author pay her rent!
I know what animal doesn't represent me. Specifically, a cat named Happy who said I was too heavy for him to carry the other day.
I love the cherry blossoms in Magnolia! Last year, I got sick and had to miss the guild's annual viewing party so Natsu and Happy dug up a tree and brought it on a boat to my apartment window.
You were willing to risk your clothes without knowing how to play poker? That's either brave...or perverted. Not sure I want to know which.
Well if I knew that was allowed, I would have brought someone who knows how to use plant magic along.
Is that knife some sort of family heirloom?
My friend Natsu can seem incredibly dumb, but he's actually some sort of secret genius when it comes to training and battle.
I love reading and writing! I'm actually working on a book about my adventures!
Oh, are you a bear panties kind of girl, Aoba?
Are you counting time skips? Let me tell you, those can be a pain.
I just have my ears pierced.
I know a wizard who can change her weight at will.
Well there was this one outfit I was particularly fond of, but my landlady "borrowed" it while I was missing for seven years.
I only have my ears pierced.
I've been lucky enough to avoid any permanent scars. Not all of my friends have been so lucky.
That's a good point. Maybe I should use my journalist skills to figure this out!
W-w-well, there is somebody, but they'd probably just destroy the Inventory.
Experienced or not, I'm still taking you down, Hilda!
Um, well...sometimes I think about my mom. She passed away when I was young, and I hope that she would have been proud of me.
Um, I don't really run a deck normally, but even I know not to give your opponent free advice!
Wait! Did a blue cat tell you what I did at the Christmas party last year! Darn it Happy, why can you never keep a secret?!
Well, one of my friends is lost somewhere in the world and I promised to find her, so I'd like to go to wherever she is.
I definitely prefer the heat! My very first mission as a Fairy Tail member I had to go up a freezing mountain, and it was terrible.
I'm an okay cook, but my guildmate Mirajane is much better than me!
Well to be honest, I didn't learn to cook until after I ran away from home. When I was younger, the servants cooked my meals.
You mean like the King's Game? Last time I played that, I got hot wax dripped all over my back, so no thank you!
One of my celestial spirits, Lyra, is an amazing singer!
Our money is called jewels, and I never have enough of them!
Well, I was an only child so things were pretty lonely for me growing up...wait, did you say all your sisters are named Anna too?
Well, I did dress up as a bunny to promote a restaurant opening once. The owner is a good friend of Fairy Tail's master and a former Magic Council member.
Do you want to go shopping after this, Anna? I could use someone with your bargaining skills to help negotiate prices!
I would probably use it to help with rent.
Well, I did strip for the guild master's game once, but that was because a certain friend of mine took things too far.
I'd love to hear about music, Sayaka. My guildmate Mirajane is an amazing singer. My guildmate Gajeel on the other hand...well just be glad you've never heard him sing.
Oh, you use ice make magic? My friend Gray does too!
I tend to have an internal monologue. I like to think of things I can write about in letters to my mom.
Hmmm, I guess this is probably my favorite outfit. I did have this cute outfit I used to wear, but my landlady "borrowed" it when I was presumed dead for seven years...long story.
I'm named Lucy because my parents were in a guild called Love & Lucky and the k fell off the sign so it read Love & Lucy.
Welcome to the club.
Wait, you have your own holiday? I've never heard of it.
Well, my boobs certainly aren't lame.
I love the spring! When the cherry blossoms bloom in Magnolia, Fairy Tail always gets together to have a party!
I was pretty lonely growing up so I often wished I had a sister. The closest I ever got to that was a girl named Michelle.
My favorite hobbies are reading and writing.
No, I'm from out of town. I live in a town called Magnolia in the Kingdom of Fiore.
A sale? That sounds great. Cheap food is the best.
How late I stay up depends on if I'm on a job. Erza has a tendency to crawl into bed with me, and Natsu and Gray stay up fighting so when I'm on the job sleep is hard to come by.
I have definitely not played any other stripping games. In fact, I shouldn't even be playing in this one!
Wait, why would you need to carry ducks?
Wow, your gallery sounds amazing, Galatea! We used to have lots of amazing art in my home growing up.
I don't have any snacks. Usually I just get some from my teammate Erza. She carries around tons of suitcases filled with food on every mission.
For the record, I'm not even wearing a bra. Mine are all natural.
I don't plan on anyone finding out what my pubic region looks like today!
I will admit that could be a little fun...there was that one time I ran through town naked while I was invisible. Maybe the exhibitionists are onto something.
Our dignity is on the line here! I can't blame you for taking this seriously, Mercy.
I'd wish to buy my family's old home back! I'd never have to pay rent again!
There's this amazing resort at Akane Beach. The last time I visited was so relaxing!
Wait, how do you know I'm shaved...wait, no you meant...and I just said...oh no.
Thanks, Ignatz. I'd love to be painted...I haven't gotten to model for one since I was a young girl and my mom was still with us.
I actually met my younger self once, and ended up inspiring her to join Fairy Tail. Maybe your interaction with your younger self is meant to be, like a time loop.
I don't play any instruments myself, but my spirit Lyra is an amazing harpist. I'd show you, but her contract says she's off today.
Honestly, facing critics was the hardest part of writing for me in the past. In fact, I used to be so shy about critics that my best friend Levy had to beg me to read my novel.
When I was a little girl, I liked rice balls. My dad...well he didn't.
I like free food...hey, rent is expensive!
Wow, you really must be new here. Magic is a part of everyday life in Fiore. We use it for just about everything!
Well, with my body it's too hard to pick just one thing. It's not easy being this beautiful!
Last time I was part of a musical performance, I lost a bet and had to be a backup dancer...in a bunny girl outfit.
Hakobe Mountain can be pretty dangerous. There are monsters called Vulcans that can transform you into one of them if you're not careful.
There's a magic guild called Raven Tail that was created specifically to beat my guild. They even threatened an innocent little girl!
Well, I'm from the country of Fiore. It's not the biggest nation, but it's filled with magic and amazing people. I hope you can visit someday!
There was one time I was in the dungeons underneath the Royal Palace in Crocus. There's all sorts of creepy catacombs down there.
Doesn't the food go right through you though?
I saw someone make a bet with the she-devil once. She made them pose naked in a magazine! Mirajane can be scary.
My friend Gray used his ice make magic to make a kite to fly on once. It was pretty cool, no pun intended.
I do miss having a garden back home. My apartment doesn't really have space for one.
You know you remind me of my best friend Levy, Aoba. She gets annoyed about her boyfriend calling her short sometimes.
Yeah, I've taken several jobs where we tasked with recovering a relic...unfortunately, my team has a bad habit of breaking said relics.
My friend Natsu has a stupid cat named Happy that loves to tease me.
Stop by the Fairy Tail guild sometime and ask for Mirajane. She books the entertainment at the guild hall.
I'm from Earthland. The town of Magnolia in the nation of Fiore, specifically.
Do you have the sheet music for that song? I bet Mirajane would love to sing a song like that for Natsu's birthday at the guild.
I love to read during my free time, particularly adventure stories!
Um, I'm not really sure what digital is. Do you mean you use lacrima to enhance your singing?
You have nothing to worry about, Sayaka. You're very pretty and I used to work with professional models.
You know, Levy tends to react like this when we visit the hot springs together. I wonder why?
Sounds like you've got a bad hand, Natsuki. Would you mind taking one for the team and losing this round? I don't want to strip again!
Well this Earthland girl is definitely embarrassed when she's nude.
It's too bad you don't like bars, Meia. I would have invited you back to the guild for a drink.
Two of my close friends have blue hair actually, so it's not totally unique in Earthland.
My home in the Kingdom of Fiore has a queen. She's actually a good friend.
Speaking of cards, did you happen to see if Cana had sobered up when you left the guild, Erza? She said she was too hungover to play today.
You know that does seem to be your lucky armor, Erza.
Uh, we probably shouldn't tell Master about this place, Erza. He'd like it a little TOO much.
Oh I remember when the bikini top that went with those bottoms got destroyed, Erza. Good thing Jellal was there to cover you up.
Oh those are the bottoms from that swimsuit that frayed apart while you wearing it, Erza. Between you, me, and Mira a lot of us ended up topless that day at the water park.
My guildmates and I go on adventures around the world. Right now, we're tracking down the five dragon gods on a 100 Year Quest.
Um, I would tell you all about it, but I'm sure you don't have time to hear about all of the many, many boys I have definitely dated for real.
I've dated tons of men...so many...definitely been on at least one date. Please believe me!
How about taking some sexy pictures for her? Having worked for Weekly Sorcerer Magazine, trust me that it's not just the men who enjoy the pinup shoots.
Ooh, is the present worth as much a month's rent? A year's? More?!
I'm pretty sure my landlord would evict me if I played loud music...not that I am doing anything that needs covered up by music!
Hey, that's cheating! You can't put clothes back on!
I summon celestial spirits. Golden gate keys are one of a kind and their spirits are already named. Silver keys are numerous, and the wielder gives their spirit a name. Like Plue, for example!
The cutest thing I've ever seen? Probably Nasha she's the daughter of someone very close to me.
I've heard my friend Natsu's cat Happy was very cute when he first hatched from his egg.
One time I had to dance in a bar...it was a um, revealing outfit.
I've fought in a war, so yeah, I've seen people die before. I didn't enjoy it, Revy.
Kardia Cathedral is one of the most prominent landmarks in Earthland!
I like to mix and match the colors in my wardrobe, but I guess I like blue and white. My guild mark is pink though.
Yeah, I doubt this will be more humiliating than being stripped naked in front of an entire army by a dragon.
I really love listening to my guildmate Mirajane sing at the guild hall. Now, Gajeel on the other hand is terrible.
Trust me, when you've been thrown through the air completely naked by a dragon, it's pretty hard to have a new most humiliating moment.
Sorry, I don't have a chance to watch many lacrima film recordings. I tend to spend my free time reading and writing.
Yeah, this game makes me glad to be an only child!
I found out about this place from my guildmate Cana. She was supposed to come play here for a job, but got too hungover to do it.
I've never played cards much before. I'm just a substitute for the person who was supposed to take this job.
So in other words, you've just been hiding cards up your sleeves.
Honestly, I ran away from home at sixteen. My mom passed when I was young and my father...well that's complicated.
Well, Fairy Tail takes jobs sort of like mercenaries do. We pride ourselves on always keeping our word to our clients, and on protecting our fellow guild members!
Well, there was the time I ended up naked on a battlefield. Apparently dragons think humans taste better without clothes on.
Taking a life is never easy, but unfortunately sometimes it's necessary to save the world and your friends.
I'm most skilled with my celestial spirit keys, but my whip is a handy backup when I'm running low on magical power.
Well, I tried to win the Miss Fairy Tail contest once, but I only got runner-up to Erza.
I've never heard of Japan or Ionia. Are they in the Alvarez Empire, by chance?
Ramen, eh? That depends are you buying?
I used to think invisibility would be a cool power...until I accidentally ended up invisible once. I had to streak through town to avoid causing a panic since my clothes weren't invisible too.
I'm impressed, Joey! I never would have guessed.
M-my hair? Okay, he's creeping me out.
I once met an alternate universe version of myself who has a daughter. Her husband's counterpart in my universe thinks babies come from eggs, so I doubt I'll be joining her.
G-g-ghosts?!
I had a pretty good cheerleader routine planned for the Miss Fairy Tail competition, but the Thunder Legion ruined it.
Hmm, maybe I should have asked Levy to come instead if it's a blue hair themed game.
I got to see the celestial spirit realm once! It was so amazing to see the home of all my beloved celestial spirit friends!
There's supposed to be a song about me involving diamonds, I think. Personally though, I prefer the jewels that you pay rent with.
Miku, you remind me of my friend Wendy! She's still a kid though so she'll probably grow to be bigger than you someday.
Wow, your voice sounds really similar to mine, Asuna.
If you figure that out, let me know. I hate to admit it, but I've never had a boyfriend.
That was nice of your friend, Sola.
Between you and me, my friend Erza is in love with this guy named Jellal. She'd never admit it, but they are super cute together!
Oh, is that your son, Bulma? It must be nice to have a mom around.
I would, but I need my money for rent!
I don't really have anyone like that. I'm still so new to Fairy Tail I'm still looking to surpass other people.
There was this guy named Dan who was obsessed with me once. He moved on to stalking a convicted murderer.
I do know a cat named Happy.
My friends Gray and Natsu never stop fighting. Well, unless Erza puts them in their place.
Well, Juvia is inseparable from Gray...even if he wishes she wasn't.
My personal favorite type of music are the ballads that Mirajane sings in the guild hall sometimes.
One of my celestial spirits, Lyra, is a really good singer.
Oh, is HP like your version of magic energy? A wizard can die from Magic Deficiency Syndrome.
I know someone like that! The co-founder and first master of the Fairy Tail guild, Master Mavis, stopped aging when she was in her teens due to a spell gone awry.
Honestly, everyone in the guild really tries to avoid getting sick. Mostly because our guild healer hates humans.
Pirate stories remind me of the time Erza commandeered a pirate ship to capture me and my friends after we took an S class mission without permission.
My spirit Lyra is a wonderful singer, but I can only summon her three times a month.
That's what you get for trying to film us!
Well, why don't you try it out for yourself after the game, Megumin? I bet you'd like it.
Thank goodness no one is watching your recording. This is humiliating enough without the whole world seeing.
I sympathize. Unfortunately, I've seen far too many of my male friends naked.
A LONG story, huh?
I won't ask how you know his size if you don't ask why I know the size of all my male teammates.
I actually have had to fight my friends to bring them back to their senses before. It was hard for me to do, but I'm glad I saved them.

I'd support them no matter what. A friend of mine asked me to help through something she felt like she couldn't do. I ended up losing seven years of my life, but I don't regret helping her for a moment!
I know what you mean. I should be able to be alone in my apartment, but my friends are constantly breaking in.
I, I, I know all about love. I've read all sorts of romance stories, and, and, and I...have never been on a date.
Free food?! You might be my new favorite player.

Well, one time a dragon used his powers to strip me naked in public and tried to eat me. I got away, but landed butt naked on my best friend and he groped me in a misguided attempt to cover my breasts.
I've never actually played this game before, no. I just got sent here at the last minute because our resident card sharp is hungover.
Well, I did take down an entire enemy base full of demons once, but I lost someone very dear to me in the process so I don't like to talk about it.
Never been eaten by a giant frog, but a dragon did try to eat me once.
A net...oh, do you know someone who uses vegetable magic? Beth Vanderwood from Mermaid Heel uses flying vegetables in combat too!
Ahem, my eyes are up here.
Honestly, they should ban demons from here altogether!
I'm not a demon. In fact, I have a very bad history with them.
My town in Magnolia actually is designed to split in half. My guildmate Gildarts has a bad habit of accidentally destroying the city so they had to find a way to keep him away from the buildings.
I'd recommend visiting 8 Island Restaurant in Hargeon if you get a chance! They prepare the food with magic and the owner is a retired Fairy Tail wizard and Magic Council member!
Yep, definitely no scar there, Nagisa.
Well, Exceeds talk. They look like cats.
I've used my feminine charms to distract people before. And it always, ALWAYS works. Don't believe any stories you've heard!
Would you like to hear about the time I fought a dragon and went missing for seven years?
There was this guy in the rival Phantom Lord guild who had an accent Juvia later told me was French.
You could always try hiring Erza Scarlet. One time she commandeered a pirate ship just to get a ride.
Okay, too much detail about dead bodies!
Well, you're a better actor than Erza at any rate.

condition.saying: I, Megumin, the foremost master of explosions of the Crimson Demons, shall defeat you with this hand!

case.state: Uh, Megumin...it may not be a good idea to give a victory speech every time you get a good hand.
I don't think that's the best strategy, Mary, but I'm happy for any help I can get.
It would be nice to get out of the city for a bit. I'd be happy to visit your forest, Lyralei!
I do like vegetable juice. You've gotta eat healthy to have a great body like mine.
One time I had to dress up as a bunny to help promote the opening of a new restaurant...and then zombies attacked.
My favorite hobby is writing! You haven't read any of my work, have you?
How insecure do you have to be to ask strangers for compliments on touching yourself?
Why would you need to know a death growl?!
Well, I heard they made a game about us on something called a PlayStation so I guess that?
Uh, I'd donate, but I'm pretty broke at the moment.
How about Kuma?
Wait, you've done that while being recorded on a lacrima before?!
Don't get too cocky, ~Leader~. I still plan on winning this.
~Leader~ might be winning for now, but a Fairy Tail wizard never gives up!
Oh, don't even get me started on crazy friends. One strips his clothes off all the time, another sets everything on fire, one likes to crawl into my bed, and that's just the start.
You're going to regret picking me for this game, ~player~!
Come on cards, just one more win to get the victory for Fairy Tail!
What zodiac sign are all of you? I'm interested which of my spirits represents you.
Honestly, I'm kind of surprised Cana was too hungover to come on this job. Half our guild's liquor goes to her every month but she has the strongest alcohol tolerance I've ever seen.
I could use a break from every place I go to on a job getting blown up, so this job is actually fairly nice so far.
I hope Natsu and Gray aren't fighting while I'm gone. God help them if they make Erza angry.
There aren't many celestial spirit wizards these days. Maybe I should invite Yukino from Sabertooth to come here some time. It's been a while since all our spirits were together.
One of my friends suggested I add a more risque scene in my next novel, but I won't say who it was since she would murder me if I told.
Now that I think of it, I did get drunk with Cana the other day and I don't remember if I told her I needed some alone time...is that why she gave me this job?!
By the way, I didn't stay this long because I'm some sort of secret pervert. I just, well...a girl has needs and my friends won't give me any privacy.
Hm, maybe the exhibitionists are onto something...um, uh, that's a line...from my book. That I am writing...in my head. Right now.
Mirajane suggested that I try to do a cute pose the next time I ended up naked in public to avoid embarrassment...it's not working.
I should have stopped drinking with Cana after that time I passed out and woke up to find Natsu drew his cat on me while I was asleep. The eyes were my...never mind.
My guildmates Wakaba and Macao actually picked up the latest issue of Weekly Sorcerer Magazine for the guest article I wrote...and my bikini photos. Actually, just for the photos. Dirty old men.
It must be intimidating playing with a professional model. I wouldn't be surprised if you all threw the next hand.
I mean I know I'm not a top tier model like Mirajane and Jenny, but you'd think people would lose on purpose for me.
Why do my sexy distractions never work? I mean, I'm not crazy, right? I'm gorgeous!
Can you believe Natsu and Gray saw me naked by accident recently and said it's happened so many times they're used to it by now? I mean, look at me! Er, wait no, don't look!
Happy keeps telling me I'm not good at sexy distraction plans. This pose is pretty good though, right?
If I put a strip poker scene in my next book do you think I should have the heroine win to uphold her guild's honor or lose to take care of her own needs?
Natsu still thinks girls lay eggs when they have babies, so he doesn't really understand the need for, well...private time. Cana did say I looked stressed after the last time he broke in.
Gray broke in the other day to hide from Juvia during her latest attempt to gift him a body pillow with her on it. Yet more alone time ruined.
I was trying to relax after a mission, but Erza broke in because she wanted to talk about boy troubles. I love her like a sister, but it was terrible timing.
I've been struggling with writer's block about a romance scene for the protagonist in my next novel...maybe she could play strip poker with the guy she likes?
I always used to hide my writing from people. Sometimes, it still doesn't feel real that I'm a published novelist!
I actually started writing as a way to deal with grief over losing my mom. I'd write letters about my life to her, and eventually I made a book about my adventures.
I finally got a chance to publish my writing when I worked for Weekly Sorcerer Magazine for a year. I started as a model, but I decided to focus on writing instead.
Visit 8-Island Restaurant! Hey, so what if I took a product placement fee?
Fairy Tail wizards take jobs requiring the use of magic throughout Fiore. I've done everything from saving a demon cursed island to acting in a play.
Well, we're from Earthland so I'm not sure if it's exactly the same, but we're a wizard guild. People post job requests at the guild for the mages who belong to Fairy Tail.
I'm used to people ogling me, but believe me I know how to use this whip, and my celestial spirits are more than happy to help me out.
Fairy Tail is a guild for wizards. We take on jobs that need magical help in exchange for pay.
Well, it shouldn't be thinking about me.
I used to wish I could be in a magic guild all the time when I was a child. It was a very lonely time in my life.
Our guild was actually named after a book about fairies our first master loved!
Well, this wasn't an official job. I was doing a favor by filling in for my friend Cana...who happened to be so drunk she forgot to tell me.
Oh, my tattoo? Where I come from, when you join a magic guild, you get a magic tattoo of your guild mark. The day I got my Fairy Tail guild mark was the happiest in my life!
Well, I do have contracts with nine of the Zodiac spirits, but several of them would just perv on me if I called for help.
Wait, have people been spreading rumors that I'm some kind of dominatrix again? My whip is for self-defense only!
Without my celestial spirit keys I'm just an average girl, so I figured it would be a good idea to carry a backup weapon in case I run out of magic power.
Well, we occasionally play games when things are slow, but mainly we're a wizard guild. We take jobs from people who need mages to help them in exchange for a reward.
We are a magical guild! In fact, we're the most famous magical guild in Fiore! A little too famous for destruction, but that's not the point!
Ugh, I cannot believe I have to do this. Why do I always have to take my clothes off on jobs?
Time to play my trump card. Open, Gate of the Virgin Palace, Virgo!
Enjoy it while you can because Fairy Tail never loses to the same opponent twice!
I'll just take my stockings off. You know, this reminds me of the time I ended up barefoot in the royal palace.
I guess I can take my boots off. We do get our stuff back after, right? They're my favorite pair.
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
Just remember, I'm still winning. Brilliant and beautiful, that's me!
I really wish I could say this is the first time I've ended up naked during a job.
Well, I guess you did see my panties already, so it's not like I have much dignity left to lose.
I've done a lot of things to protect Fairy Tail's reputation, but this is ridiculous.
Don't even think about trying to look up my skirt when I take my stockings off!
Just my boots this time. A little thing like that won't faze me!
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
I-I have to go topless?! Okay...I'll do it. For training! So I don't get flustered next time I end up naked on the battlefield. No other reason, nope.
Fine, a bet's a bet, but if anyone touches me while I'm naked, they're getting a Lucy kick to the face!
I was really hoping I'd get out of here without taking off anything major.
Don't you dare look, Gray!
Naked in front of a guildmate...again. Why me?!
So...any chance you were just joking about this being strip poker? Please?
Come on Lucy! Get it together before you damage the guild's reputation!
Between constantly having to replace my clothes and paying for the damages Natsu and the others cause I barely have money for rent!
I...I guess I can take my belt off. Just please don't touch my celestial spirit keys! My spirits are my precious friends.
NOOO! Not again! Cana is still teasing me about the dragon stripping me naked at the Grand Magic Games!
Wait-I really have to get completely naked?! Why does this always happen to me?
I really should have worn some less revealing underwear today.
Why does everyone always think I'm some sort of dominatrix because of the whip? It's for combat, I swear!
Actually, a lot of the jobs my team takes involve collecting bounties. You don't happen to have one on your head currently, do you?
Well, this whip was given to me as a gift by my celestial spirit Virgo. It extends at will giving me good range of motion in combat.
Um, well...I didn't really wear a bra today. As long as I get my keys back after this is over, it should be okay.
My keys unlock the gate to the celestial spirit realm, and before you get excited only celestial spirit wizards can use them.
Hmph, and Happy always says I can't distract anyone with my sex appeal. That cat doesn't give me enough credit.
Fairy Tail is a wizard guild. We come together to take jobs posted by the people in Fiore. We're the most famous guild in the country!
Um, well...if I'm being honest, it can be kind of hard to find a good bra with a chest like mine.
Virgo, I need you to bring me more clothes from the celestial spirit realm! I'm so glad I'm a celestial wizard right now.
I'll just take the sleeves off with the jacket to be fair.
A while back I ended up running through a battle in the capital city of Crocus barefoot. Compared to that, this isn't so bad.
Why is everyone staring? Hey, don't look up my skirt!
Aquarius would have killed me if I had lost her key in a poker game.
Could you all not tell anyone about this? I sort of made a bet with a guildmate I could make it an entire month without losing my clothes on the job, and I may not have the jewels to pay up.
No matter how many times I end up naked on a job, it's always humiliating.
Deep breath, Lucy. It's just like wearing a bikini bottom to model.
What's Absolute Territory?
Well, I didn't know I was going to be showing them off!
I'm sorry, princess. There is an anti-cheating charm that makes me do the opposite of what you ordered. Does this mean you'll punish me?
Hmm, I guess I'm not smart enough to win every round.
Usually, I'd take my stockings off too, but I need all the items I can get!
I decided to go with my stockings because I also learned in Crocus wearing just thigh highs and your underwear is actually more embarrassing than not having stockings.
Eeeek!
Okay, this is really humiliating, but if I can make it through this I can make it through losing my clothes in a fight, right?
Butt naked in front of total strangers. I swore I'd never let this happen again after I got drunk at that book awards ceremony!
Then again, my bikini bottoms aren't this risque.
Having a butt this good is the reason I got off with only a spanking after going on an S-class job without permission. Mirajane got pretty mad at Master for that.
Yeah, I don't think we'll need our magic to beat ~name~, Megumin.
Wait, has this Kazuma been trying to force you to play these kinds of games with him, Megumin? You should stay away from perverts!
Sorry, ~name~, but you're not going to be taking any of my clothes today.
Paying attention to me instead of your cards, ~name~? I can't blame you for getting distracted by a beautiful girl like me!
Despite any rumors you may have heard, I have never stripped in public. Never. So don't get any ideas, ~name~, because I'm not losing!
So, why did you choose to play with me, ~name~?
Are you trying to lose, ~name~? Letting me win is a great way to impress me by the way.
My teammates like to joke about my seduction techniques failing, but they seem to be working pretty well on ~name~.
Thank you for keeping me modest a little longer, ~name~.
I won't tell anyone about this if you don't tell anyone about seeing my underwear, ~name~.
This is payback for you laughing when my skirt fell down.
Don't look at me while you strip, ~name~!
It's hard to enjoy this victory without my clothes.
I-I'm just happy I didn't lose. Not cause you're stripping, ~name~!
Well, I, ah, suppose ~name~ isn't...huff...so bad to look at.
I can't believe I'm doing this in front of you, ~name~.
Okay, I guess I can understand why Cana took this job.
D-don't look at me, ~name~...it makes it even more humiliating when it's a cute guy like youuu...um, nothing!
Why did it have to be ~name~ who saw me naked?
Well, I suppose this isn't the worst consolation prize.
Wait, you could talk the whole time?!
I can't believe I'm watching a guy I just met strip while I'm indecent.
I-I'm sorry I stared. It's just, I'm nervous, and um, uh, yeah.
If you do want to cut your hair, ~name~, I could summon my spirit Cancer to help out! He's a great hairstylist!
As a professional writer, I'm qualified to tell you that your puns are awful.
Actually that prize will be mine, thank you very much.
Shouldn't you be more concerned about a man stripping while you're already naked, Erza?
I heard usually it's another boy whose name Erza says while doing this. One that starts with a J...oh crap, she's gonna kill me.
Score another win for Fairy Tail!
It's very gentlemanly of you to let me keep my clothes on! Thanks!
I bet this isn't how you imagined this game would go.
I am going to show all of you why Fairy Tail is the best guild in Fiore!
Usually, I'm the one who ends up losing her clothes on a job so this is pretty nice.
Can't focus with a beautiful girl like me here, huh?
Beautiful, smart, and lucky. I'm pretty amazing, aren't I?
I'd feel bad for ~name~ but I'm still annoyed about losing my keys.
Hey, I saw you staring when my skirt fell down earlier, so don't expect mercy now.
Sorry, but I'd rather not take anything else off just yet.
After ogling my panties, this is the least you could do for me.
At least I won't have to drop my skirt again.
I'm glad I didn't lose again, but I still feel embarrassed about a boy stripping while I'm so undressed.
My friend Gray Fullbuster has a habit of stripping at odd times, but usually I still have my clothes on when he does it.
I'm not usually one for revenge, but you've been ogling me all game!
I...don't really have much...experience with boys so sorry if I get flustered!
Just focus on stripping whatever you're taking off and stop looking at me!
I'd prefer to have all my clothes still, but at least I haven't lost yet.
I'm still in this...for now.
Hey, maybe I'm learning to focus even when I'm embarrassed.
I...I'm not getting excited because you're stripping!
Well...I suppose you stripping might...um, help I guess.
C-could you not look at me while you strip? This is...hard enough...without you staring.
D-don't look at me while you strip! I'm not looking at you, I swear!
I suppose I could enjoy you stripping...just a little bit.
A-am I enjoying this? N-no, I couldn't be.
Hmph, you deserve this after making me touch myself in public.
Can you hurry up? I'm ready to put some clothes back on.
I'm cold and sticky now, so no, I am not excited you're stripping.
If you try and complain about this after what I just went through I will Lucy kick you!
C-could you not look at me while you strip? This is already humiliating enough!
Don't feel bad, I am the strongest wizard in Fairy Tail...okay, I can't get away with a lie that big.
You know, beating a Crimson Demon actually wasn't too hard.
Sorry, ~name~, but I really want to finish a job with all my clothes on for once.
If only one of us can leave here with our clothes it's going to be me!
So what made you decide to pick me to play with, ~name~?
Oh good, ~name~ has to strip. Uh, I just mean that I'm not the one who has to.
Sorry ~name~, but this beauty has brains too!
I was pretty nervous about stripping, but you seem pretty calm ~player~.
That's what you get for laughing when my skirt fell down, ~name~.
Thank you so much for losing ~name~. I owe you one!
My friend Erza likes to say bathing together makes girls closer. I wonder if strip poker works the same way?
Please have mercy ~name~! Take something big off so everyone will stop staring at me!
Having another woman strip too makes this a little less embarrassing.
Say after this stressful game, I could use a refreshing massage. Want to come with, ~name~?
~Name~ reminds me of looking at Mirajane's pinups...did I just say that out loud?
I give you permission to stare at me...just this once, okay!
Maybe, huff, this isn't so bad.
Don't even think about taking a long time stripping just so you can stare at me longer ~name~.
I've been naked in the baths with other women plenty of times, but this feels...different.
Wow, I almost feel a little ashamed of my body compared to yours, ~name~.
Ah, you two are so wholesome!
Just try it! You wouldn't be the first demon I've killed!
I've fought demons before, so don't threaten me.
Again? It's just not your day, Natsuki.
I never thought Aoba would curse!
Bet you wish you had a chest like mine, Aoba.
Wait, wait, wait! You think your SISTERS want you to get naked in a game of strip poker?!
Um, well...it was embarrassing to tell someone I just met that I could see their strawberry panties.
If showing your breasts shook you, wait til you're naked like the rest of us!
Looks like Meia isn't so unshakeable once you get her out of her suit.
I'm sorry-I didn't mean to humiliate you, Meia! I just have to win this for my guild!
You didn't complain when I had to go topless, so yes the bra.
Wait, who exactly is Maurice?!
Wait, who is she? Is she playing?
Yunyun, calm down. I wouldn't hate you even if you quit now.
I'm not messing with the cards. I don't use card magic, unlike Cana who should be here instead of me.
For once, being overshadowed by Erza in Weekly Sorcerer Magazine won't be so bad.
I better keep winning, cause I don't think Natsuki's chest is gonna distract anyone from mine.
Hey, at least it's just women here. That should make this a little easier for you.
No way am I letting you win the prize, Nami! I need the rent money!
Don't feel too bad, my attempts to manipulate people usually don't work out either.
I bet ~player~ would lose a round for me, Nami.
I totally thought ~player~ would fall for that. I'm actually a little insulted on your behalf, Nami.
What's going on, Nayru?!
Oh, you had to wear elaborate dresses as a girl too, Meia? I grew up as an heiress, but I left those days behind when I ran away from home.
I understand better than most how hard it is to lose your material possessions, Meia.
Don't worry, Florina. You can do a lot more than you think when you have friends with you, and after a game like this we are definitely friends.
Nice try, I'm not falling for that.
Guess Miku's not quite the consummate performer she appears to be.
S-s-secret weapon?!
Ugh, why didn't I think about counting my hair ties?!
Everyone saw my panties earlier too, so don't feel too bad, Natsuki! We're in this together!
Hey, if I had to show my chest so do you!
Wait, what do you mean Earthland is an organ farm?!
Believe me, this is much worse than just getting naked.
I'm pretty sure you can't be "innocent" and a "pirate".
Looks like Nami's about to show us her treasure.
